message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.MM

Reasoning: The paper deals with activity recognition using vision-based techniques and deep learning, which falls under the computer vision (cs.CV) and machine learning (cs.LG) sub-categories. The use of IoT devices and the implementation on Raspberry Pi suggests a focus on artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and information retrieval (cs.IR) sub-categories. Additionally, the potential applications in entertainment and simulations suggest a possible connection to multimedia (cs.MM) sub-category.
